description:
First, Keroro and his friends in childhood find a broken-down robot that they try to repair.  Then, back in the present, they have to fight a Caries War inside Keroro again!  But something seems funny about these mouth-invaders...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chibi Kero, When Your Ear is Stolen / Keroro, Caries War 2
ちびケロ 耳をすませば / ケロロ カリエスウォー2
